content:
When I was typing show 1+1=2 by there is a "By"in the autocompletion list which make no sense and annoying.
How can I fix this?
screenshot.png
Is it possible you used "By" somewhere in the file/project?

Daniel Weber said:

Is it possible you used "By" somewhere in the file/project?

You are right. There is a "By" in my comment of the file. Is it possible to fix this without delete the "By" in commet?

These auto-completions are a VS Code feature (i.e. not provided by Lean). You can disable them in your settings menu (File > Preferences > Settings) by setting the 'Editor: Word Based Suggestions' configuration option to 'off'.

Marc Huisinga said:

These auto-completions are a VS Code feature (i.e. not provided by Lean). You can disable them in your settings menu (File > Preferences > Settings) by setting the 'Editor: Word Based Suggestions' configuration option to 'off'.

Thanks a lot. This really works. I mistake think that this is provided by the plugin of lean.
hilbert has marked this topic as resolved.
